askForGeneration.title: Generate Email Reports?
askForGeneration.description: Would you like to create fully encrypted email reports for your mails? Only you will be able to access them. Not even we can decrypt them.

enterPassword.title: Set up your password
enterPassword.description: Please enter a safe password so that we can encrypt your data.

alreadyCompleted.title: Encryption already enabled
alreadyCompleted.description: You already have encryption enabled. Changing passwords is currently not supported.
